definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[בַּ֫יִת]] c. art. [[הַבַּיִת]] Is 15:2 acc. to Ew Brd Di al.

definitions.title: n.pr.loc
definitions.body: but abbrev.; perh. for [[בֵּית דִּבְלָתַיִם]] Je 48:22 (so Ew al.) or [[בֵּית בָּמוֹת]] cf. MI:27 (cf. De Di); others (Ges De Che Or) take ´[[הַבּ]] here = the house, i.e. temple or shrine.
